Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit - Model Garden for LM Studio

Features:
- Modern React + TypeScript + Tailwind CSS UI
- Chat interface with streaming support
- Model selection and management
- Multiple theme support \(Dark, Midnight, Cyberpunk, Forest\)
- Splash screen with branding
- Docker support for deployment

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Make LM Studio URL configurable for Docker

- API_BASE now uses VITE_LM_STUDIO_URL env variable
- Dockerfile sets default to host.docker.internal:1234 for Docker
- Falls back to 127.0.0.1:1234 for local development

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

EOF
\)")
